channel.title: Uniting NC
channel.description: Building Community. Welcoming Immigrants. Uniting North Carolina.
channel.itunes:summary:
With the Uniting NC podcast, you can meet your North Carolina immigrant neighbors one story at a time.

At Uniting NC we believe that all people, including immigrants, should have the opportunity to engage and thrive in their communities. Together we all do better. For more information, visit unitingnc.org.
channel.itunes:author: Uniting NC
channel.itunes:subtitle: NC Neighbors

item.title: Children’s ‘NC is Home’ Shirt
item.dc:creator: Chris Liu-Beers
item.description: Our new children’s ‘NC is Home’ shirt is a great way for children to welcome all the students in school. Perfect for the summer! Languages in order of appearance: Russian, German, English, Korean, Spanish, Hindi, Mandarin, Hebrew, and Arabic.

item.title: Women’s ‘NC is Home’ Shirt
item.dc:creator: Chris Liu-Beers
item.description: Our new women’s ‘NC is Home’ shirt come in two fun colors that are perfect for any outfit. These shirts are a fitted women’s cut and run small. We recommend purchasing a size above what you would normally purchase. Languages in order of appearance: Russian, German, English, Korean, Spanish, Hindi, Mandarin, Hebrew, and Arabic.

item.title: Men’s ‘NC is Home’ Shirt
item.dc:creator: Chris Liu-Beers
item.description: Our new men’s ‘NC is Home’ shirt come in two colors that are perfect for any outfit. Languages in order of appearance: Russian, German, English, Korean, Spanish, Hindi, Mandarin, Hebrew, and Arabic.
